description: The shelter in a Brussels building helps women affected by domestic abuse in Belgium's lockdown.
title: Coronavirus: European Parliament shelters 100 homeless women
title_page: Coronavirus: European Parliament shelters 100 homeless women - BBC News
maintext: "We had to move on all the time in this lockdown, my husband and I walked 15km (nine miles) daily, the police told us 'you must keep moving'. At the end of the day we were exhausted," she said.
